articles.content: New York (CNN Business)Ahold Delhaize, the Netherlands-based owner of US supermarket chains Stop & Shop, Giant and Food Lion, is buying the online grocery service FreshDirect as demand for online… [+3132 chars]

articles.title: GoodRx co-CEO says Amazon Pharmacy is 'complementary,' not a competitor - CNBC
articles.description: Shares of GoodRx continued to trade lower after Tuesday's sell-off.

articles.title: FDA approves first home COVID-19 test: Here's why most Americans won't get it before next spring - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Lucira home test will be limited to patients in Northern California and  Miami-Fort Lauderdale until next spring;  requires a doctor's referral.
